title: Queen Sense 14"x14" Steelers Neon Sign Light Man Cave Bar Pub Beer Gift Neon Lamp A114PS
features: 1. SIZE is about 14"x14" (metal frame). Comes with a chain, can be mounted on the wall/window, or placed on any flat surface.
2. Low temperature, high security ,highly energy efficient and durable. 100% handcrafted Real Glass Tube, NOT plastic tube lights or LED signs.
3. Made by senior master benders supported with professional teams. Well tested, Quality assured, 365-Day Warranty,suitable for 110v~240v for most countries.
4. Excellent for displaying in your shop, bar, pub, club, restaurant, room and anywhere you like. Wonderful AD sign and gift! Colorful and Impressive! Unique and Exquisite workmanship.

5. The sign you will receive looks just like the one shown in the picture. If you want another color, please just contact us. Please note that neon tube size is a little smaller than the metal frame size and the color may vary slightly from the picture you see on your computer screen. Please contact us FIRST if any problem with your order, we promise we will do our best to solve the problem for you ASAP until you are 100% satisfied.
description: Thank you for purchasing from our store--The worldwide leading Neon Signs Supplier!
All our products are new! Real glass tube, well tested, quality assured, 100% hand-made, gas-filled.
110V for US and Canadian customers, 220V to 240V for European countries. Comes with US 2 pins plug as default. We will provide power system according to your country.
Fast delivery to most regions including North America and Canada! (ETD may vary during busy holidays season). Well-packed in a foam box filled with sponges to protect the sign.

You are very welcome to customize any sign you like, all you need to do is to briefly describe your idea or send a sketch to us. Our professional neon sign designer will design that for you! Other pattern design please visit our storefront.

We have over 25 years experience for various neon signs products, and all of our new gorgeous real neon glass tube signs are well tested and double-checked before shipping. Running with very experienced benders supported with large professional teams.

Please feel free to contact us if any questions about your order and we will reply you within 24 hours, we promise we will do our best to solve any problem for you ASAP until you are 100% satisfied. We offer 365 days Warranty on all our signs. If damaged during shipping, we will send replacement parts or a new sign for free. Full refund can be applied if not satisfied with the sign. so no worry!
